text.jpText:
みんなのような“華”がない――
以前そう悩んでいたキタサンブラックが、
ファン投票1位となって『宝塚記念』に臨む。
text.enText:
Kitasan Black, who used to worry that she 
didn't have the "flair" that everyone else 
had, is going into the Takarazuka Kinen as 
the fan favorite. Kitasan Black, who used to 
worry about her lack of "flair" like everyone 
else, will be the fan-voted favorite in the 
Takarazuka Kinen.

text.jpText:
いよいよブリュスクマンとの決戦。
他人の才能を追う必要はない。自分の
潜在能力を最大化し、ぶつけることが重要だ。
text.enText:
Finally, the showdown with Brusque Man. 
There is no need to follow the talents 
of others. It is important to maximize 
your It is important to maximize your 
own potential and to hit it.
